meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Josh Perkins Robby Schrum Heather Groggel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4418.

div.div:
2003 College Championship semifinal game 3.
From Yale University.

td.p: Josh Perkins, a sophomore at Rice University from Houston, Texas
Robby Schrum, a junior at Yale University from Crown Point, Indiana
Heather Groggel, a junior at Concordia University Wisconsin from Oxford, Ohio

tr.td: SPEECH!
LORD OF THE RING
JEFFERSON, LINCOLN OR CLINTON
EAT YOUR FOREIGN VEGETABLES
SLOGANEERING
"FAT" CHANCE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Speaking at an 1848 convention, Elizabeth Cady Stanton said, "We now demand our right to" do this')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Speaking at an 1848 convention, Elizabeth Cady Stanton said, "We now demand our right to" do this
